links: Index entries for two-way infinite sequences
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2, -4, 3, -1).
formula: a(5*n + 1) = F(5*n + 1), a(5*n + 2) = F(5*n + 3), a(5*n + 3) = 0, a(5*n - 1) = a(5*n) = -F(5*n), where F = A000045 the Fibonacci sequence.G.f.: x / (x^4 - 3*x^3 + 4*x^2 - 2*x + 1). - _Michael Somos_, Apr 25 2003
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(x, y); x = fibonacci(n); y = fibonacci(n+1); [ -x, x, y, 0, -y][n%5 + 1]}
author: _Michael Somos_, Oct 07 1999
